comment: Oh FYI, all this CLIMATE CRISIS crap happened right before COVFIB19.... colds come and go, people will adapt. There HAS NEVER BEEN a vaccine for the Corona Virus and there will never be one. This is a EXPERIMENTAL DRUGWAKE UP PEOPLE!
amr:
# ::snt Oh FYI, all this CLIMATE CRISIS crap happened right before COVFIB19.... colds come and go, people will adapt. There HAS NEVER BEEN a vaccine for the Corona Virus and there will never be one. This is a EXPERIMENTAL DRUGWAKE UP PEOPLE!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c2 / come-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / cold-01))
                  :op2 (g / go-01
                        :ARG1 c3))
            :ARG1 (a2 / adapt-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person)))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (v / vaccine
                  :polarity -
                  :beneficiary (d / disease
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Corona"
                              :op2 "Virus"))
                  :time (e / ever))
            :op2 (v2 / vaccine
                  :polarity -
                  :beneficiary (d2 / disease
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Corona"
                              :op2 "Virus"))
                  :time (e2 / ever)))
      :snt3 (d3 / drug-up-00
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :mod (t / this))
            :mod (e3 / exact))
      :snt4 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (v3 / vaccinate-01
                  :ARG1 p2)
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (d4 / disease
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "COVFIB19"))
                  :mod (r / right)))
      :snt5 (a4 / and
            :op1 c2
            :ARG1 c3)
      :op2 g
      :ARG1 c3
      :snt6 (v4 / vaccine
            :polarity -
            :beneficiary (d5 / disease
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Corona"
                        :op2 "Virus"))
            :time (e4 / ever)))
